infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: QuickTrash needs location access to find nearby pickup services and provide accurate pickup locations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: QuickTrash needs location access to track contractors and provide real-time pickup updates.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: QuickTrash needs camera access to take photos of trash items and verify pickups.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: QuickTrash needs photo library access to upload images of trash items.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: QuickTrash may need microphone access for voice messages in the chat feature.
